title: Diary application
description: This app is developed with the aim of enhancing the users' ability to freely write and express their thoughts and emotions on a digital platform. Users can effortlessly create, view, edit, or delete their writings.

title: Chat Application
description: The Chat Application enables users to register, log in, and communicate in real time. It features a secure authentication system for safe interactions. With an intuitive interface, users can seamlessly connect and chat with others....

title: Crud
description: This application allows users to enter and store their name, email, and phone number in a database. It supports full CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) functionality, enabling users to manage their data effortlessly.

title: Student-Mentor Allocation
description: This application manages student and mentor allocation with sections for Home, Student, and Mentor, enabling easy student creation, mentor assignment, and tracking.

title: React Blog App
description: The React Blog Application categorizes articles into Data Science, Full Stack Development, Cyber Security, and Career Growth, offering a seamless reading experience to keep users informed.
